definition: the attire worn in a play or at a fancy dress ball, to dress in a costume
details:
noun
- the attire worn in a play or at a fancy dress ball
= example: the attire worn in a play or at a fancy dress ball
- the attire characteristic of a country or a time or a social class
= example: the attire characteristic of a country or a time or a social class
- unusual or period attire not characteristic of or appropriate to the time and place
= example: unusual or period attire not characteristic of or appropriate to the time and place
- the prevalent fashion of dress (including accessories and hair style as well as garments)
verb
- to dress in a costume
= synonyms: dress up
- to furnish with costumes
